Source.Name: ossfs
Source.Description: OSSFS enables you to mount Alibaba Cloud OSS buckets to a local file in Linux/Mac OS X systems. In the system, you can conveniently operate on objects in OSS while using the local file system to maintain data sharing.

Package.Name: ossfs
Package.Description: OSSFS enables you to mount Alibaba Cloud OSS buckets to a local file in Linux/Mac OS X systems. In the system, you can conveniently operate on objects in OSS while using the local file system to maintain data sharing.
